name: ivory/serializer
description: Serializer for PHP 7.0+ supporting JSON, XML, YAML & CSV

suggest.doctrine/annotations: Allow you to use the mapping annotations.
suggest.ext-dom: Allow you to use the XML serialization visitor and mapping.
suggest.ext-json: Allow you to use the JSON serialization/deserialization visitors and mapping.
suggest.ext-simplexml: Allow you to use the XML deserialization visitor and mapping.
suggest.phpdocumentor/reflection: Allow you to parse PHP type more efficiently
suggest.symfony/event-dispatcher: Allow you to use the event dispatching system.
suggest.symfony/property-access: Allow you to use the Symfony accessor/mutator.
suggest.symfony/property-info: Allow you to use the mapping type auto discovery.
suggest.symfony/yaml: Allow you to use the YAML serialization/deserialization visitors and mapping.
